fields.headline: Football Weekly
fields.bodyText: James Richardson is joined by Barry Glendenning, Paolo Bandini and Ian Prior to discuss the issues of the Easter weekend. A fuming Mascherano sees red - can anyone stop United? There's an Avram love-in for Grant, Keegan wins at last, long overdue away points for Sunderland and - stifle those yawns, folks! - international friendlies. Plus a round-up of the action in Italy and Sid Lowe in Spain with news of a three-horse race for La Liga, the battle for a Champions League spot, and a blow-by-blow account of a Spanish headbutt and other attacks.
